text:
"Planet of the Apes" is an American science fiction movie released in 2001 and directed by Tim Burton. It was based on the novel "La planète des singes" written by Pierre Boulle and released in 2001 and is a remake of the 1968 movie. The movie stars Mark Wahlberg and features Tim Roth, Helena Bonham Carter, Michael Clarke Duncan and Paul Giamatti. It was released by 20th Century Fox.
Plot.
Leo Davidson lands on a planet inhabited by smart apes.
Reception.
The movie received mixed signals, particularly the twist ending.
